item.title: Quickly creating kubernetes manifest files
item.description: When someone is just starting with kubernetes, writing manifest files can be a bit difficult. In this post I will try to give some tips in writing manifest files easily. Pods Use the generator to create pods. Verify if the given entries are syntactically correct by doing a dry run. 1kubectl run --generator=run-pod/v1 <pod name> --image <image to use> --dry-run Save the pod definition to a yaml file for future changes as well as reference
